about.headline: Engineering Digital Aesthetics.
about.bioShort:
I don't build websites; I architect digital estates.
Full-stack developer & Visual perfectionist.
My code is cleaner than your conscience.
about.background: Started in Graphic Design (2016). Evolved into C/C++ (School 21). Mastered the Modern Web (Next.js + AI).
about.philosophy: I believe that "good enough" is an insult. I use AI agents to automate the boring stuff so I can focus on what matters: Physics, Typography, and Vibe.
about.currentStatus: Obsessed with R3F shaders, building my own backend in Go, and strictly avoiding mediocrity.
